name: We Have Evangelion at Home
description:
My entry for the july-2022 Mech Jam III!

Use your stolen Mechprototype to figth against wave of tanks and airplanes who want to recover your Mech! Try and see how far you can go!

Controls:

  • Move your Mech with  WASD, jump with  the Space bar, and aim with the Mouse.
  • Shoot your arm weapons with left-click and shoulder weapons with right-click.
  • You can change your equipped weapons with Q(arm weapons) and E(shoulder weapons).
  • You can mute the music with M.
  • To use your anti-air weapon, press and hold the right mouse button. It should target airships as long as you hold it and release  a volley of missiles when you release it.

Obs:

The game runs better with the windows version, although it is played on the browser. Apologies for the lack of sound effects. There are things to improve and fix, and I might get there after the jam :). Hope you enjoy it!

Obs2:

There is some stuttering in the webgl version.  Try the Windows build if you like the game!
